sentences.en: "I want to find these stars because I want to look back in time," says Frebel, now at the Harvard-Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics.
sentences.cn: “我想找到这些恒星，因为我想回顾过去。” 弗雷贝尔说。 现在，她在哈佛大学-史密森天体物理中心工作。

sentences.en: A record - breaking heat wave closed Harvard University near Boston.
sentences.cn: 空前的热浪使波士顿附近的哈佛大学被迫停课.

sentences.en: A: He got the scholarship to Harvard.
sentences.cn: 他得到了哈佛大学的奖学金。
哈佛大学队领先4个艇位胜出。

sentences.en: Has the Harvard catalog come yet ?
sentences.cn: 哈佛大学简介来了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He graduated summa cum laude from Harvard.
sentences.cn: 他以最优等成绩从哈佛大学毕业。

sentences.en: He has had a swelled head since he went to Harvard.
sentences.cn: 自从他进入哈佛大学之后,他就得意得冲昏了头.

sentences.en: He is not intelligent, so he entered Harvard through the back door.
sentences.cn: 他并不聪明, 因此他是以走后门的方式进入哈佛大学.

sentences.en: He majored in International Politics at Harvard University.
sentences.cn: 他在哈佛大学主修国际政治.

sentences.en: He was a professor of criminal law at Harvard University law school.
sentences.cn: 他是哈佛大学法学院的刑法学教授。

sentences.en: His chances of getting into Harvard are one out of a hundred.
sentences.cn: 他进入哈佛大学的机会微乎其微.

sentences.en: I came into contact with very bright Harvard and Yale students.
sentences.cn: 我接触到一些非常聪明的哈佛和耶鲁的学生。

sentences.en: I have no doubt he will serve Harvard with the same passion.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，他会以同样的热情去为哈佛大学服务。

sentences.en: Longfellow was lucky in securing a professorship of modern languages at Harvard.
sentences.cn: 朗费罗能够在哈佛大学当上现代语言教授是出于幸运.

sentences.en: People are crowded into Harvard yard on Degree Day.
sentences.cn: 毕业典礼日哈佛校园里宾客云集.

sentences.en: The campus of Harvard University is very beautiful.
sentences.cn: 哈佛大学的校园非常漂亮.

sentences.en: The most exciting game was Harvard versus Yale.
sentences.cn: 最富紧张刺激的球赛是哈佛队对耶鲁队.
